info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bladen, Robeson, northwestern Columbus, Dillon and eastern Marlboro Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clinton to 8 miles southeast of Hoffman. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Dillon, Elizabethtown, Red Springs, Rowan, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Bladenboro, Latta, Rowland, Lake View, Clio, Boardman, Rex, Hamer, Ammon and Hestertown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 180 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
